activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#11635
activity.text:
The current issue is that feature tags in the facility editor become unreadable on hover due to a lack of contrasting background styles. This is caused by missing hover background color classes in the FeatureBadge component located at src/pages/Facility/Utils.tsx.

Proposed Solution:

I will update the variantStyles object in the FeatureBadge component to include hover:bg-{color}-200 Tailwind classes for all tag variants. This ensures the background color lightens on hover while maintaining readability against the dark text (text-{color}-800).

Additional Context:

    Affected File: src/pages/Facility/Utils.tsx

    Platform: Windows / Chrome v132.0.6834.111

    Fix verified visually for all variants

    Screenshots and diff confirm issue resolution


ETA - ASAP
